sentences.sentence: New cars start to depreciate as soon as they are on the road.
sentences.translation: 新车一上路就开始贬值。

sentences.sentence: Shares continued to depreciate on the stock markets today.
sentences.translation: 今日股市股价继续下跌。

sentences.sentence: It will just depreciate its way out of the current mess.
sentences.translation: 它就是要通过贬值来走出目前的困境。
